structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIII(O). OJUS URBAN AREA DISTRICT

text.section:
Except as provided herein, all permitted, conditionally permitted, and temporary uses within the OUAD shall comply with of this Code.
As provided in the Land Use Regulating Plan, no duplexes shall be permitted in areas designated:
Residential (R) with a maximum permitted density of 6 dwelling units per net acre; and
Residential Modified (RM) with maximum permitted densities greater or equal to 36 units per net acre.
No recreation building, playground, or park owned and operated by a municipality, county, state, or the federal government shall be permitted in areas designated R on the Land Use Regulating Plan.
No civic uses shall be permitted in areas designated R on the Land Use Regulating Plan, except for educational facilities on properties not to exceed 5 acres.
Institutional uses. The following additional uses shall be permitted in the Institutional (I) area in accordance with the Land Use Regulating Plan and the Street Types Development Parameters.
Civic uses in accordance with the Street Types Development Parameters.
On lots located west of NE 25th Avenue, all uses permitted in the Residential (R), with the density shown on the Density Plan.
On lots located east of NE 25th Avenue, all uses permitted in the Residential Modified (RM), with the density shown on the Density Plan.
Residential Modified Live/Work (RML). The following uses shall be permitted in the Residential Modified Live/Work (RML), in accordance with the Land Use Regulating Plan and the Street Types Development Parameters:
All uses permitted in the Residential Modified (RM); and
Live/work units.
